## ISharedInterleavedPoint2dQuadIndexer interface

Indexes a [ISharedInterleavedConnector](./core.isharedinterleavedconnector.md) which describes a collection of 2d points representing a continuous line.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export interface ISharedInterleavedPoint2dQuadIndexer<TArray extends TTypedArray> extends ISharedObject 
```
<b>Extends:</b> ISharedObject
